    • showMainFrame

      private void showMainFrame() throws java.io.IOException
      -create the main JFrame and adds to it the WelcomePanel in order to let the player insert his nickname and send it to the Server -it also create the WelcomeFirst panel but it becomes visible only in one case (see: PanelManager.readObject() )
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - for errors when reading from file
